name: Panda Bubble Pop
description:
Panda Bubble Pop is an addictive Shooting Bubble Game. Play this Panda Bubble Pop best fun game in which you have to help Panda Pop the Bubbles. All Bubble Shooting Puzzles are full of fun & adventure.
This classic bobble shooter game for all of kind age: children, teenagers and adult and the best way to spend time when you are waiting bus in city, in Subway or waiting for someone.

Panda Bubble Shooter has 2 Modes of Play. Pop all the bubbles to get to a new level, making connections of 3 or more. Shoot all bubbles & Score High.

Classic Puzzle & Endless Game
In Classic mode you have 120 Levels Fun Puzzles, Bubble Panda is very addictive thanks to the huge number of levels that it offers, and because each level provides you with a certain number of stars, so replay ability is at its best here. 120+ fun levels of saga puzzles, shoot bubble base on level.

In Endless Game mode you will keep on playing and it will be a never ending bubble shooter adventure.

This is the most classic and amazing shooting bubble game. This is a special title that will help you spend free time in the best possible way, without spending a dime. No matter where you need to go, this game will go along with you at all times and provide you with the entertainment value that you need.

If you want to try out a unique, sole bubble shooting game, then you need to try this game Panda Bubble Pop right away!

The game is entertaining, super exciting and a great way to spend free time on an airport, on the bus or train and wherever. Althought this game is similar to the bubble games, this one has a unique edge, whatever game mode you will choose, you are certainly in for a lot of fun, as Panda bubble pop is here to help you get the best possible entertainment value very fast.

Download the Panda Bubble Pop & Start enjoying!
